sourceMeaningMnemonic: The radical <radical>blade</radical> and the kanji <kanji>blade</kanji> are exactly the same.
meaningInfo: Please, just know your radicals. Please!
readingMnemonic: When you stab your <kanji>blade</kanji> into an enemy you shout "<reading>Ha</reading> (<ja>は</ja>)!" It's just the normal "thrusting with blade" sound.
readingInfo: Ha, HA, HaaAA! Those are the blade sounds we all know and love.
